data: In the city of encounters, the Bagdad of the West, and, to be more precise, on the broad northern pavement of Leicester Square, two young men of five- or six-and-twenty met after years of separation.
Bagdad of the West | Leicester Square
Stevenson, Robert Louis, 1850-1894; Stevenson, Fanny Van de Grift, 1840-1914
